azureLogAnalytics.query:
AppRequests 
| where Name == 'azrefapp'
| summarize
  Success=countif(Properties.ResponseCode < 400),
  Failed=countif(Properties.ResponseCode >= 400)
  by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

AppRequests 
| where Name == 'azrefapp'
| summarize SuccessRate=todouble(countif(Properties.ResponseCode < 400) * 100) / todouble(count())
    by Operation=tostring(Properties.SampleLabel), bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

AppRequests 
| where Name == 'azrefapp'
| summarize p99_LatencyInMs = percentile(DurationMs, 99) 
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

let Latency=AppRequests 
| where Name == 'azrefapp'
| summarize p99_LatencyInMs = percentile(DurationMs, 99) 
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| order by TimeGenerated;
Latency
| project TimeGenerated, delta=(p99_LatencyInMs-prev(p99_LatencyInMs,1,0))*100/p99_LatencyInMs
| project TimeGenerated, DeltaNormalized=iif(delta == 100,0.0,delta)

AppRequests 
| where Name == 'azrefapp' and Properties.SampleLabel == 'Request_GetOrders' and Properties.ResponseCode<300
| project  TimeGenerated, TestResult=extract_json("$.itemsMatched",tostring(Properties.ResponseData))
| summarize VerifyCheckoutFailed=countif(TestResult=="FALSE") by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

AppRequests 
| where Name == 'azrefapp' and Properties.SampleLabel == 'Request_GetAndValidateCart' and Properties.ResponseCode<300
| project  TimeGenerated, TestResult=extract_json("$.itemsMatched",tostring(Properties.ResponseData))
| summarize VerifyCartFailed=countif(TestResult=="FALSE") by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

panels.title: App Gateway KPIs - If right column region name is N/A, it means secondary region is not configured. Ignore right side of the dashboard.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "APPGW"
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| summarize
    SuccessRate=(sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests")-sumif(Total, MetricName == "FailedRequests"))*100 / sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests"),
    FailureRate=sumif(Total, MetricName == "FailedRequests")*100 / sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests")
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "APPGW"
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| summarize
    SuccessRate=(sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests")-sumif(Total, MetricName == "FailedRequests"))*100 / sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests"),
    FailureRate=sumif(Total, MetricName == "FailedRequests")*100 / sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests")
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "APPGW"
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| summarize
    TotalRequests=sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests")
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "APPGW"
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| summarize
    TotalRequests=sumif(Total, MetricName == "TotalRequests")
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "AKS" and MetricName == "kube_pod_status_ready"
| summarize PodReady=avg(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "AKS" and MetricName == "kube_pod_status_ready"
| summarize PodReady=avg(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)

KubeNodeInventory
| summarize countReady=countif(Status=="Ready") by type=tostring(parse_json(Labels)[0].agentpool), TimeGenerated
| evaluate pivot(type, take_any(countReady))

KubeNodeInventory
| summarize countReady=countif(Status=="Ready") by type=tostring(parse_json(Labels)[0].agentpool), TimeGenerated
| evaluate pivot(type, take_any(countReady))

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "redis" and MetricName == "cachehits"
| summarize cachehits=sum(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "redis" and MetricName == "cachehits"
| summarize cachehits=sum(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "redis" and MetricName == "errors"
| summarize ErrorCount=sum(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)

AzureMetrics
| where Resource contains "redis" and MetricName == "errors"
| summarize ErrorCount=sum(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)

AzureMetrics
| where ResourceProvider contains "SQL" and MetricName == "sessions_count"
| summarize totalsessions=sum(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)

AzureMetrics
| where ResourceProvider contains "SQL" and MetricName == "sessions_count"
| summarize totalsessions=sum(Total) by bin(TimeGenerated,10m)
